Title: Fraternity Vacation
Actors: Stephen Geoffreys, Sheree J. Wilson, Cameron Dye, Leigh McCloskey
Plot: A nerd gains the friendship of two of his frat brothers when his dad offers them his condo for the week in Palm Springs, and also offers the fraternity a hot tub and jacuzzi if they can help his son find a girl. They meet two guys from a rival fraternity, and make a bet on who can nail the Designated Babe first.
